work.title: Front-End Developer
work.description: Resourceful Front End Web Developer bringing in-depth knowledge of latest technology trends to produce clean website design. Experience handling complex HTML and CSS coding, design and extensions to meet organization's front-facing internet needs. Detail-oriented collaboration with others to define project expectations and demand. Hands-on testing and debugging to address inconsistencies and maintain performance thresholds. File Encryption and Decryption Application,Encryption and decryption are coding/decoding techniques to avoid misuse of data in case it goes to the wrong person. It involves 2 keys, public and private. Each receiver/sender knows its private key and noon else knows, and each receiver/sender' spublic key is known to all on the network. Web Technologies using Html, Css, JavaScript and used Algorithm AES DES.

testimonials.text: I have had the opportunity to work with Tim on multiple occasions which has always been a pleasure. He is driven and motivated with a consistently positive attitude. Tim excels at communicating with others and is always willing to work hard until he solves the problem at hand.
